 2004-13542004-11-18,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of PAUL D. MANSON of Ottawa, Ontario, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Civilization to hold office during pleasure for a term of two years.
